Articles.Content:
try to get to another celestial body only using IVA and the map

the winner is the one with the farthest planet/moon reached

bonus points for stock only, getting back, distance, how wonky of an orbit it has, and not having an atmosphere

so if you can get to Bop and back you basically win

pics and file for the spacecraft please

Edited September 26, 2012 by Chozonuat
forgot something
